characters: A person riding an electric tricycle, possibly male, wearing dark clothing, appears to be middle-aged. A person on foot, appearing female, wearing a dark jacket and light-colored pants, is also involved.
summary: The video shows a near-miss accident.  A person riding an electric tricycle is crossing the road from the right side, partially obscured by a temporary barrier.  A female pedestrian is walking near the tricycle. The tricycle almost collides with the self-driving vehicle. The driver of the self-driving vehicle brakes to avoid a collision. The pedestrian appears to be involved in the near-miss, possibly due to the sudden appearance of the tricycle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is moving forward at a moderate speed. Upon observing the electric tricycle suddenly appearing from behind the barrier, the vehicle immediately brakes to avoid a collision. The speed of the vehicle decreases significantly.
key_objects: 1) Right: An electric tricycle, approximately 2 meters away at closest approach, suddenly emerging from behind a temporary barrier, nearly colliding with the vehicle. 2) Right: A female pedestrian, approximately 3 meters away, walking near the tricycle, potentially contributing to the near-miss.
